description: monkey in blue shirt and yellow pants with left leg crossed over right leg sits on raised red seat on top base of rectangular box; dancing dog and cat to his respective proper right and left sides; lattice work on all 3 sides; "ORGAN BANK" on front side with design of organ and organic design with music book in between this design
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on back side below lattice work engraved: [PAT JUNE 18 1887]
markings: on bottom, on sticker 1:  [#191-16 2 (in circle) / \"Organ Bank (Cat and Dog) / 68120 200 / #177M 4225]; Sticker 2: [D.89 / 319 / FAO SCHWARZ]
title: "Organ Bank, Cat and Dog" mechanical bank
